text: Aneka isvaranci upasana karanare mhanatila, allahane icchile asate tara amhi ani amacya vada-vadilanni, allahasobata dusaryanna upasya manale nasate, na ekhadya vastula harama tharavile asate asa prakare yancya purvicya lokanni khote tharavile, yethaparyanta ki amacya azabaca svada cakhuna ghetala. Tyanna sanga, kaya tumacyajavala ekhade jnana ahe tara te amacyasathi bahera kadha (jahira kara) tumhi atakalivara calata ani phakta anumana lavata
